mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, George Washington to Elizabeth Powel, 1795 January 25
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Washington sends her a copy of Jefferson's "Notes of Virginia" [Notes on the State of Virginia] -- cannot find "Dr. Franklin's Strictures on the abuse of the press" among his remaining volumes of the Bee -- he hopes to see her at dinner tomorrow. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, integral cover, docketed, red seal with blurred Washington seal, incomplete watermark (George Washington's). Name on original manuscript appears as "G. Washington".
